name: Information
value: All content featured here is for entertainment purposes only.  Do not attempt anything you see here and make sure to always check with a qualified health care professional, particularly a physician, before making any decisions about your health.

name: Info Continued.
value: This channel will occasionally post fake headlines or make commentary about actual headlines in a satirical manner.  Please always make sure to do your own fact checking and remember this is for entertainment purposes only.  We support the LGBTQ+ communit
